3: Today, Nanami is freshly eighteen! Nanami's an adult now.
Well then, what should I record?
Aha, right! When we're eighteen, we can match with others with the 'Gestalt' system and find more friends.
Nanami's mommy and daddy matched through the system and got together as well! It's an amazing piece of technology!
If it's possible though, Nanami would kinda wish that the person she's matched with is... black-haired... Will they be a boy?
Black hair looks really nice... But, even if they don't have black hair... it's okay.
Maybe the system will find Nanami's 'perfect match,' just like it did for Mommy and Daddy.
Nanami will be happily ever after. Just like Mommy and Daddy...
